articles.title: Is It Too Late To Consider GM After Its 61.3% Year To Date Surge?
articles.mainIdea: Is It Too Late To Consider GM After Its 61.3% Year To Date Surge?
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Is It Too Late To Consider GM After Its 61.3% Year To Date Surge?. How Has General Motors Stock Been Performing? After a strong run up in General Motors share price, many investors are wondering whether the stock still offers value or if most of the upside has already been priced in. Over the past year, GM has delivered a return of 56.5%, with gains of 2.9% in the last week, 16.7% over the past month, and 61.3% year to date, all from a recent close of 82.88. This performance looks even more striking in a longer term context, with 3 year returns of 162.9% and...
